setNow.js: let d = new Date(); mem.fromDate = ('0'+d.getDate()).slice(-2) + '.' + ('0'+(d.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2) + '.' + d.getFullYear()+ ' ' + ('0' + d.getHours()).slice(-2) + ':' + ('0' + d.getMinutes()).slice(-2) + ':' + ('0'+d.getSeconds()).slice(-2);

let d = new Date(); mem.toDate = ('0'+d.getDate()).slice(-2) + '.' + ('0'+(d.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2) + '.' + d.getFullYear()+ ' ' + ('0' + d.getHours()).slice(-2) + ':' + ('0' + d.getMinutes()).slice(-2) + ':' + ('0'+d.getSeconds()).slice(-2);

onTaskCreated.js: return !task.params?.componentPath && task.params?.objectKey && backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'swiftIncome', method: 'get', params: {...task.params.objectKey}}).then((r)=>{mem.file=r; mem.record=r; mem.out_fields =r;if(!task.params.taskId)action({name: 'onSetTaskTitle'});  forceUpdate();})

action.js: return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'swiftIncome', method: 'save', params: {app: mem}}).then((r)=>{ tm.setTaskTitle(task.key, `Paymment`); })

onChange.js: const copy = { ...params.row }; console.log(mem); mem.snd_mid_bank = copy.BANK; mem.snd_mid_bank_acc_val = copy.VAL_CODE; mem.snd_mid_bank_acc = copy.ACC_CODE; mem.snd_mid_bank_name = copy.BANK_NAME;

action.js: return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'swiftIncome', method: 'save', params: {app: mem}}).then((r)=>{ tm.setTaskTitle(task.key, `Paymment`); })

return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'swiftIncome', method: 'saveSettings', params: { id: mem.record?.id, folder_in: mem.record?.folder_in, folder_out: mem.record?.folder_out, server: mem.record?.server }});
return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'swiftIncome', method: 'save', params: {app: mem}}).then((r)=>{ tm.setTaskTitle(task.key, `Paymment`); })
return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'swiftIncome', method: 'save', params: {app: mem}}).then((r)=>{ tm.setTaskTitle(task.key, `Paymment`); })

onGetRows.js: if (context.dossier && !params.docType){onSuccess(context.dossier)}else{backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'swiftIncome', method: 'getList', params: {id: mem.id}}).then((r)=>{if(params.docType){const d = context.dossier.find((e)=>e.docType==params.docType); context.dossier.splice(context.dossier.indexOf(d), 1, r[0]);}else{context.dossier = r;} onSuccess(r);})}

script.py:
# Get single record by ID
from apng_core.db import fetchone
from apng_core.exceptions import UserException

SQL = """
    SELECT *
    FROM swift_input
    WHERE id = %(id)s
"""

#raise Exception(parameters)

with initDbSession(database='default').cursor() as c:
    try:
        c.execute(SQL, {'id': parameters.get('id')})
        data = fetchone(c)
        if not data:
            raise UserException('Record not found')
    except Exception as e:
        raise UserException({
            'message': 'Error fetching record',
            'description': 'SQL:\n%s\nparams: %s' % (SQL, {'id': parameters.get('id')})
        }).withError(e)

-- Table: public.swift_input

-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.swift_input;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.swift_input
(
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    file_name text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    status text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    content text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    imported timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
    content_out text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    error text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    txt_ben text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    txt_pay text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    nsdok numeric,
    val_code text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    dval timestamp without time zone,
    CONSTRAINT swift_input_job_item_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.swift_input
    OWNER to postgres;

GRANT ALL ON TABLE public.swift_input TO apng;

GRANT ALL ON TABLE public.swift_input TO postgres;

from apng_core.db import fetchone

SQL = 'SELECT id::text AS id, folder_in, folder_out, server FROM swift_settings LIMIT 1'
with initDbSession(database='default').cursor() as c:
  c.execute(SQL)
  data = fetchone(c)

from apng_core.db import fetchone
from apng_core.exceptions import UserException
from apng_core.auth import getUser

with initDbSession(database='default').cursor() as c:
    SQL = """
            
            update swift_input set
            snd_mid_bank = %(snd_mid_bank)s,
            snd_mid_bank_name = %(snd_mid_bank_name)s,
            snd_mid_bank_acc = %(snd_mid_bank_acc)s,
            snd_mid_bank_acc_val = %(snd_mid_bank_acc_val)s
            where id = %(id)s;
    """
    try:
      c.execute(SQL, { 
                        'id': parameters.get('app').get('record').get('id'), 
                        'snd_mid_bank': parameters.get('app').get('out_fields').get('snd_mid_bank'), 
                        'snd_mid_bank_name': parameters.get('app').get('out_fields').get('snd_mid_bank_name'), 
                        'snd_mid_bank_acc': parameters.get('app').get('out_fields').get('snd_mid_bank_acc'), 
                        'snd_mid_bank_acc_val': parameters.get('app').get('out_fields').get('snd_mid_bank_acc_val') 
          
      })
    except Exception as e:
      raise UserException({'message': str(e)})
